short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the Status of time, vedio Completion Status and increase your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience a heightened level of productivity while watching YouTube videos with our innovative Chrome extension - the YouTube Productivity Assistant. Elevate your video-watching efficiency and stay focused with this intuitive tool that provides essential insights and controls right at your fingertips. Seamlessly integrated into the YouTube interface, our extension allows you to effortlessly monitor your progress with a completion percentage indicator and receive real-time estimates of time remaining in the video, dynamically adjusted to your chosen playback speed. Embrace better time management and effortlessly grasp your video consumption habits, all in a clutter-free, user-friendly interface.

Take control of your YouTube experience like never before with the YouTube Productivity Assistant. Eliminate the need to navigate through settings to modify playback speed, as our extension empowers you to adjust it directly from the main screen. Whether you seek accelerated learning or better comprehension, choose from a range of playback speeds tailored to your preferences. Maximize your productivity and make every second count with this must-have Chrome extension.
